org.apache.flink.client

类 CliFrontend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.client.CliFrontend

  • public class CliFrontend
extends Object
    Implementation of a simple command line frontend for executing programs.

      • buildProgram

        protected PackagedProgram buildProgram(ProgramOptions options)
                                throws FileNotFoundException,
                                       ProgramInvocationException
        Creates a Packaged program from the given command line options.
        返回:
        A PackagedProgram (upon success)
        抛出:
        FileNotFoundException
        ProgramInvocationException

      • retrieveClient

        protected ClusterClient retrieveClient(CommandLineOptions options)
        Updates the associated configuration with the given command line options
        参数:
        options - Command line options

      • getJobManagerGateway

        protected org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.ActorGateway getJobManagerGateway(CommandLineOptions options)
                                                                       throws Exception
        Retrieves the ActorGateway for the JobManager. The ClusterClient is retrieved from the provided CommandLineOptions.
        参数:
        options - CommandLineOptions specifying the JobManager URL
        返回:
        Gateway to the JobManager
        抛出:
        Exception

      • createClient

        protected ClusterClient createClient(CommandLineOptions options,
                                     String programName)
                              throws Exception
        Creates a ClusterClient object from the given command line options and other parameters.
        参数:
        options - Command line options
        programName - Program name
        抛出:
        Exception

      • parseParameters

        public int parseParameters(String[] args)
        Parses the command line arguments and starts the requested action.
        参数:
        args - command line arguments of the client.
        返回:
        The return code of the program

        Submits the job based on the arguments

                                                InetSocketAddress address)
        Writes the given job manager address to the associated configuration object
        参数:
        address - Address to write to the configuration
        config - The config to write to

      • getActiveCustomCommandLine

        public CustomCommandLine getActiveCustomCommandLine(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine commandLine)
        Gets the custom command-line for the arguments.
        参数:
        commandLine - The input to the command-line.
        返回:
        custom command-line which is active (may only be one at a time)

      • getCustomCommandLineList

        public static List<CustomCommandLine> getCustomCommandLineList()
        Retrieves the loaded custom command-lines.
        返回:
        An unmodifiyable list of loaded custom command-lines.
